articles.description: She and her allies argue she can’t be denied the speakership after Democrats seized the House on a wave of female support.
articles.content: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and her allies are framing a speakership victory as a matter of protecting political progress for women at a critical moment. | Manuel Balce Ceneta/AP Photo Nancy Pelosi is making gender a central part of her bid to reclaim … [+5721 chars]
